sourcesContent:
import { CloudUpload } from "@mui/icons-material"; import React, { useState } from "react"; export const UploadPage = () => { const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const onFileChange = (e) => { setFile(e.target.files[0]); }; const onFileUpload = (e) => { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("new-file", file, file.name); console.log(file); }; return (

Upload Files

{/*

Upload Files

Drag & drop your files here or
*/}

Uploaded Files

{file ? (

File Details:

File Name: {file.name}

File Type: {file.type}

Last Modified: {file.lastModifiedDate.toDateString()}

) : (
No files chosen
)}
); };
